@@ -0,0 +1,356 @@

body: Certainly, if I want to put the kernel codes in `/layers/kernel`, I would have to write build rules in the `/layers/kernel/BUILD` and then link to it with deps in the `tf_custom_op_library` build rules defined in `/layers/BUILD` ([here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/6205/files#diff-853b616fe717bd914bdae461d1ea26bfR77)). The problem I ran into is that I don't know how to write the `cc_library` build rules in `/layers/kernel/BUILD` that use gpu_srcs and couldn't find examples in the source code.
body_html: Certainly, if I want to put the kernel codes in /layers/kernel, I would have to write build rules in the /layers/kernel/BUILD and then link to it with deps in the tf_custom_op_library build rules defined in /layers/BUILD (here). The problem I ran into is that I don't know how to write the cc_library build rules in /layers/kernel/BUILD that use gpu_srcs and couldn't find examples in the source code.
body_text: Certainly, if I want to put the kernel codes in /layers/kernel, I would have to write build rules in the /layers/kernel/BUILD and then link to it with deps in the tf_custom_op_library build rules defined in /layers/BUILD (here). The problem I ran into is that I don't know how to write the cc_library build rules in /layers/kernel/BUILD that use gpu_srcs and couldn't find examples in the source code.
